attributes.action: Delay the passing into Legislation of the Sexual Orientation Regulations for Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These Regulations should be withdrawn as they offend the vast majority of people in Northern Ireland across the sectarian divide.
Will severly limit free speech in Northern Ireland.
The Schoold curriculum and assemblies must be entirely exempted.
Could lead to Bibles being banned from Hospitals where the Word of God offers much succour.
Christian Teachers could be forced out of the profession removing the bedrock of our System.
They override the consciences of Christan teachers and are contrary to Article 9 of the European Convention on Human Rights.
Gay rights activists have sought to ban University CUs and this will spread to schools.
